description: Authoritative component that marks an entity as following another. This is the single source of truth for the relationship. Its presence on an entity indicates that entity is a follower.

leaderId.description: The namespaced ID of the entity being followed (the leader).

activityMetadata.description: Inline metadata for activity description generation. Allows this component to define how it should be described in activity summaries without requiring a separate metadata component.

shouldDescribeInActivity.description: Whether this component should be included in activity descriptions. Set to false to hide from activity summaries.

template.description: Template string with placeholders: {actor} for the entity with this component, {target} for the entity referenced by targetRole property

targetRole.description: Property name in this component's data containing the target entity ID. Defaults to 'leaderId' for the entity being followed.

priority.description: Display priority for activity ordering. Higher values appear first. Range: 0-100. Medium priority (60) for relational state with moderate visibility.
